TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MetadataExchangeClient extends System.Object

summary.span: 下载服务元数据。

span.span: Downloads service metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 可以下载元数据。Use the to download metadata. 通常，为元数据请求配置 ，然后将其传递给 或 方法，以便 用于下载元数据。Typically, a is configured for a metadata request and then passed to the or method for the to use to download metadata. 但是，您可以直接使用 ，以将元数据作为包含 对象的 进行检索。However, you can use the directly to retrieve metadata as a that contains objects. 无论是直接使用还是传递给 ， 均包含以下成员，以控制元数据下载过程：Whether used directly or passed to a , has the following members to control the metadata download process: - 使用构造函数可自定义发出元数据请求时要使用的绑定。Use the constructors to customize the binding to use when making the metadata request. - 使用 属性可指定用于发出 HTTP/GET 请求的凭据。Use the property to specify the credentials used to make an HTTP/GET request. - 使用 属性可指定用于发出 WS-Transfer 元数据请求的凭据。Use the property to specify the credentials used to make a WS-Transfer metadata request. - 使用 属性可限制 所解析的元数据引用的数目。Use the property to limit the number of metadata references the resolves. - 使用 属性可限制检索元数据花费的时间。Use the property to limit the time spent retrieving metadata. - 使用 属性可指定是否要定位并检索由自原始元数据终结点下载的元数据所引用的其他元数据文档。Use the property to specify whether to locate and retrieve other metadata documents referred to by the metadata downloaded from the original metadata endpoint. - 使用 方法可开始下载过程。Use the methods to begin the downloading process. 此外，您还可以创建一个可重写以下两个受保护的方法的派生类：In addition, you can create a derived class that can override the following two protected methods: - 重写 方法可修改使用 WS-Transfer 发出元数据请求的信道。Override the method to modify the channel that makes a metadata request using WS-Transfer. - 重写 方法可修改使用 HTTP/GET 发出元数据请求的 。Override the method to modify the that makes a metadata request using HTTP/GET. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 来指定下载绑定、解析任何包含的元数据引用以及下载元数据。The following code example shows the use of to specify a download binding, resolve any contained references to metadata, and download the metadata. [!code-csharp[MetadataResolver#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/metadataresolver/cs/client.cs#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了用于各种协议方案的默认绑定。The following table lists the default bindings that are used for various protocol schemes. |SchemeScheme|绑定Binding| |------------|-------------| |httphttp| () ()| |httpshttps| () ()| |net.tcpnet.tcp| 带有 with a | |net.pipenet.pipe| 带有 with a |

summary.span: 获取或设置对 下载的元数据的引用的最大数目。

The default is 10.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可限制包含大量引用的元数据所访问的资源。Use the property to limit the resources accessed by metadata that contains a large number of references. 此限制应用于导致后续请求的元数据中的任何引用（包括元数据引用、元数据位置、WSDL 导入以及 XML 架构导入和包括的内容）。This limit applies to any reference in the metadata that results in a subsequent request, including metadata references, metadata locations, WSDL imports, and XML Schema imports and includes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 属性设置为 `false` 可防止对元数据引用的解析。Set the property to `false` to prevent the resolution of references to metadata. 在此情况下，引用将作为 或 内的 对象返回。In this case, references are returned as or objects inside the .
